title: 84. 5 Impactful Lessons I learned (& Re-learned!) in 2020
description:
Can you BELIEVE IT?! We are at the END of 2020! Sit back and tune into this episode where I dive deep into the lessons that I both learned in re-learned in this sweet & sour year.

The surprise is OUT! Click here to get a bundle of 75 self-love courses for $75.90! (My course, No More Codependent Thought Patterns is also included in the bundle along with some INCREDIBLE relationship courses, chakra & energy alignment courses, manifestation and mindset courses and MUCH more). Hurry though, this bundle is available for a very limited time!

Click here to join the waitlist for my 4 month group coaching program, Embodied. Spots are limited- I only have 6 spots left at the time of this podcast release in order keep it as close knit as possible. (you can also visit Beatricekamau.com/groupcoaching)

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
